content.body: I saw pure comments in there. While working on Oxc, I had to follow the non-official pure comments spec https://github.com/javascript-compiler-hints/compiler-notations-spec/blob/main/pure-notation-spec.md

content.body: Me neither, even though Babel has been supporting it for years. I was always just checking manually what uglifyjs did ðŸ˜…
I should add those links to the doc. Also should find Tobias' (?) gist where the webpack resolution behavior with exports is described which I think is close to the "standard" on that front..?
